catalog_info.title: The Politics of American Education
catalog_info.notes: american_subfield Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as SUP 447 (formerly HLE 347).
catalog_info.description: This course examines historical and contemporary forces shaping American K-12 education policy. It also reviews research and commentary on contemporary issues: class size, fiscal policy, teacher recruitment, compensation and tenure, accountability, school vouchers, charter schools and digital learning.
